H0.text: Which League 2 football team play home games at the New York Stadium. Rotherham United

A4.text: They have played home matches at the New York Stadium since 2012.

A5.text: The New York Stadium made its league debut on 18 August 2012, in which Rotherham beat Burton Albion 3â€“0, Daniel Nardiello scoring the first competitive goal in the ground.
